description: Learn how to make a light and fluffy white chocolate mousse with this easy recipe using only five ingredients.
name: White Chocolate Mousse Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 150g chocolate and 1/4 cup cream in a small saucepan over low heat, stirring, for 5 minutes or until just melted. Remove pan from heat. Cool for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, using an electric mixer, beat vanilla and remaining cream in a large bowl until soft peaks form. In a separate clean, dry bowl, beat egg whites until soft peaks form.

Stir egg yolks into chocolate mixture until combined. Fold a little chocolate mixture into cream mixture until combined. Add remaining chocolate mixture to cream mixture and fold until combined. Fold in egg whites until combined.

Divide mixture among 4 x 1-cup capacity glasses. Refrigerate overnight to set. Using a vegetable peeler, peel remaining chocolate into curls. Serve mousse topped with blueberries and shaved chocolate.
